actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for all educational programs under chapter 34 of this title.

summary.text: Establishes a forty-five month period maximum for educational assistance in programs administered by the Veterans' Administration for veterans who have served on active duty for 18 months or more since January 31, 1955.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, in order to entitle veterans to 45 months of educational assistance for all educational programs under chapter 34 of this title.
